metadata.description: Locaplus specializes in canopy and event tent rentals across the Eastern Townships, providing high-quality tents, chairs, tables, and equipment for festivals, weddings, and special events. Serving Bromont, Granby, South Shore, Sherbrooke, and Magog since 1991.

home.title: Trusted Tent & Event Rentals in the Eastern Townships
home.subtitle: With 30+ years of experience Locaplus delivers reliable tent event rentals to make your event unforgettable.

about.title: Transforming Moments into Memories, Rain or Shine

section1.title: 30+ Years of Rental Experience
section1.description: Locaplus brings decades of expertise to ensure your event runs smoothly, from intimate gatherings to large festivals across Quebec.

section2.title: Premium Tents & Equipment
section2.description: Our high-quality tents, tables, chairs, and flooring are designed to elevate any event, rain or shine.

section3.title: Tailored Event Solutions
section3.description: We offer customized rentals to match your event's unique needs, creating unforgettable moments every time.

section4.title: Official distributor and installer for Tempo shelters in the Eastern Townships
section4.description: Locaplus is the official Tempo dealer in the Eastern Townships, providing sales, distribution, and expert installation.

products.title: We've got you covered
products.description: Premium tents, stylish furniture, and all the essentials to make your event seamless and unforgettable.

contact.title: Have Questions? Ask Us!
contact.description: Looking for reliable event rentals? Locaplus offers premium tents and equipment across Bromont, Granby, South Shore, Sherbrooke, and Magog. Reach out or request a quote below!

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Locaplus, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

infoCollection.title: Information We Collect
infoCollection.description: When you fill out the quote request form on our website, we collect the information you provide, such as your name, email address, phone number, and event details.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: The information you provide is used solely to respond to your request and provide a quote. We do not store your personal information beyond what is necessary to reply to your inquiry.

retention.title: Retention of Information
retention.description: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, or as required by law.

protection.title: Protection of Your Information
protection.description: We take reasonable steps to ensure the information you provide is securely transmitted.

joinOurTeam.title: Join Our Team
joinOurTeam.description: Be a part of a dedicated and passionate team setting up tents for unforgettable events across beautiful outdoor locations. If you love working outdoors and want to be part of a company that values teamwork, this is the perfect opportunity for you.
